snippet: The unemployment rate rose to 8.4 percent from 8.3 percent in May, though economists said it was a sign of growth and indicated an increase in the number of people wanting to work.
lead_paragraph: The unemployment rate rose to 8.4 percent from 8.3 percent in May, though economists said it was a sign of growth and indicated an increase in the number of people wanting to work.

headline.main: Jobless Rate in New York City Rose Slightly in June
